item.title: Trump’s chip tariff threat sparks pushback from auto industry to tech
item.description: The possible levy of up to 25% has united rivals like Tesla, General Motors, and Ford in voicing reservations.

item.title: Emirates, Qatar Airways, and other major airlines are cancelling flights and halting routes amid uncertainty from U.S. strikes and a shaky Israel-Iran ceasefire deal
item.description: Airports and skies throughout the region have been on edge since Israel began the deadly war on June 13.

item.title: Uber and Waymo are rolling out robotaxi services in Atlanta as competition heats up with Elon Musk’s Tesla
item.description: Waymo's driverless march into Atlanta comes just days after Tesla finally launched a limited robotaxi service in Austin.

item.title: A federal judge says training AI on copyrighted works is ‘fair use,’ but casts doubt on use of pirated materials
item.description: Training AI on books Anthropic bought is ok, but downloading pirated ones is not, judge says

item.title: Crypto market bounces back after President Trump announced a ceasefire between Israel and Iran
item.description: The crypto market added 2% to its market cap between Monday night and Tuesday afternoon.
